actions.text: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-61 to require the Secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services to release all aggregated studies and data sets created on or after January 1, 2014 related to marketing and outreach for the Affordable Care Acts individual marketplace.
purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 116-61 to require the Secretary of the Department of Health and Human Services to release all aggregated studies and data sets created on or after January 1, 2014 related to marketing and outreach for the Affordable Care Acts individual marketplace.
